Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              · Server-side design and development of the services/ systems/platforms used by our products and our users
              

              · Write high-quality, clean, simple, and maintainable code; build common libraries
              

              · Analyse requirements, design and develop functionalities based on the product requirements
              

              · Understand the product thoroughly, constantly optimize the product, identify and fix problems, improve stability and user experience

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              · Passionate about coding and programming, innovation, and solving challenging problems
              

              · Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or related field
              

              · In-depth understanding of computer science fundamentals (data structures and algorithms, operating systems, networks, databases, etc.)
              

              · Familiar with one of the programming languages including Go, Python, C++, and Java; hands-on experience is preferred
              

              · Familiar with common network protocols (TCP, UDP, HTTP) and network programming
              

              · Familiar with Linux development environments and multi-threaded programming
              

              · Experience in web technologies and security is preferred
              

              · Experience in design and development of large-scale distributed systems is preferred
              

              · Were born 1993, 1994,1995, 1996 is preferred OR 0-3 year of experiences
              

              SALARY & COMPENSATIONS
              

              ♣	Salary: $1,000 to $3,000/ month
              
              ♣	Working time: 8h/ days, 5 days/ week
              
              ♣	Bonus: 1-10 months salary depend on performance
              
              ♣	Annual leave
              
              ♣	Lunch box support, annually medical check-up, weekly sport activities, monthly teambuilding, yearly vacation, …
              
              ♣	Working environment: international, flexible, creative, young and beautiful office
              
              ♣	Having chances to rotate working in other branches such as Singapore, Taiwan, Australia, India, Indonesia when job needs
              
              ♣	Working with foreign experts, foreign colleagues from Germany, France, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, …
              
              ♣	Experiences: 0 – 3 years
              
              ♣	Graduated: from top University is preferred
              
              ♣	Good mindset and good attitude, hard-working, responsible
              

              ♣	Working: Maple Tree Business Centre, District 7, HCMC
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
